title: Digital Client Service Representative - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Digital Client Service Representative Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: Assemble and provide effective packages and presentations for all prospective new and existing clients. Collaborate with and support the Account Executives on all account needs. Required to pull inventory estimates and utilize research and delivery tools.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
